SELECT d.PID , d.ID POrgID , D.OrgName POrgName
FROM B_Project (NOLOCK) a JOIN S_Organization (NOLOCK) c ON a.BUGUID = c.ID JOIN S_Organization(NOLOCK) d ON c.PID = d.ID JOIN dbo.B_ProjectJobRel (NOLOCK) e ON a.ID = e.ProjectID JOIN dbo.S_JobsUserRel (NOLOCK) f ON e.JobID = f.JobID JOIN dbo.S_Account (NOLOCK) g ON f.accountID = g.ID WHERE a.Level = 1 AND a.status = 1 AND a.isdel = 0 AND g.UserName = #{ userName } GROUP BY d.PID, d.ID, d.OrgName
